DelliDRACiSMService.description: The DelliDRACiSMService resource provides some actions and properties to support communication between iDRAC and iSM.
DelliDRACiSMService.longDescription: The DelliDRACiSMService resource provides some actions and properties to support communication between iDRAC and iSM.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Attributes.description: List of attributes iSM needs to be notified on any modifications.
Attributes.longDescription: This property shall contain list of attributes iSM needs to be notified on any modifications.

DelliDRACiSMServiceStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain the Status of DelliDRACiSMService.

MultipartSAGenericLogUploadUri.description: The URI used to perform Multipart upload of generic logs collected by iSM.
MultipartSAGenericLogUploadUri.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI used to perform Multipart upload of generic logs collected by iSM. The value of this property should not contain a URI of a Redfish resource.

MultipartSAOSLogUploadUri.description: The URI used to perform Multipart upload of OS logs collected by iSM.
MultipartSAOSLogUploadUri.longDescription: This property shall contain a URI used to perform Multipart upload of OS logs collected by iSM. The value of this property should not contain a URI of a Redfish resource.

Requests.longDescription: This property shall contain the details on the requests from iDRAC to iSM.

ServiceModuleState.description: The state of the service module on the system.
ServiceModuleState.longDescription: This property shall contain the state of the service module on the system.

ServiceModuleVersion.description: The installed version of the iSM.
ServiceModuleVersion.longDescription: This property shall contain the installed version of the iSM.

SoftwareRAIDSupported.description: Enables or disables SWRAID feature on the host.
SoftwareRAIDSupported.longDescription: This property enables or disables SWRAID feature on the host.

InitiateSupportAssistCollectionWithCheck.description: This action is used by iSM to collect supportassist logs with checksum.
InitiateSupportAssistCollectionWithCheck.longDescription: This action is used by iSM to collect supportassist logs with checksum.

Interface.description: Name of the interface which performs the action.
Interface.longDescription: Name of the interface which performs the action

InsertDiskSMARTInfo.longDescription: This action is used to insert dsik information from iSM.

DiskInfoBuffer.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the details related to the disk in JSON format.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FileTransferRequest.description: The file upload request from iDRAC to iSM.
FileTransferRequest.longDescription: This property shall contain the details associated to the file upload request from iDRAC to be notified to iSM.

GenericLogCollectionRequest.description: The request for generic log collection from iDRAC to iSM.
GenericLogCollectionRequest.longDescription: This property shall contain the details associated to the request for generic log collection from iDRAC to be notified to iSM.

NvmePrepareForRemovalRequest.longDescription: This property shall contain the details associated to the request for prepare for removal of NVMe drive from iDRAC to be notified to iSM.

OSLogCollectionRequest.longDescription: This property shall contain the details associated to the request for os log collection from iDRAC to be notified to iSM.

enumDescriptions.NotRunning: Service module not running on the system.
enumDescriptions.NotRunningTLSError: Service module not running on the system due to TLS error.
enumDescriptions.Running: Service module running on the system.
enumDescriptions.RunningLimitedFunctionality: Service module running on the system with limited functionality.

SetEjectNVMeDeviceStatus.description: This action is used to set the response by iSM for the request on NVMe device removal from iDRAC.
SetEjectNVMeDeviceStatus.longDescription: This action is used to set the response by iSM for the request on NVMe device removal from iDRAC.

Position.description: The position of the NVMe drive.
Position.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the position of the NVMe drive.

ResponseCode.description: The response code from iSM for NVMe device removal.
ResponseCode.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the response code from iSM for NVMe device removal.

Slot.description: The slot number of the NVMe device.
Slot.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the slot number of the NVMe device.

SubSystemErrorCode.description: The error code from iSM for NVMe device removal.
SubSystemErrorCode.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the error code from iSM for NVMe device removal.

Status.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the status of log collection.

enumDescriptions.Disabled: Disables SWRAID feature on the host.
enumDescriptions.Enabled: Enables SWRAID feature on the host.

SubmitLCLEvent.description: This action is used to log LifeCylce Log(LCL) event.
SubmitLCLEvent.longDescription: This action is used to log LifeCylce Log event.

Category.description: The category of the LCL event.
Category.longDescription: This parameter shall contain category of the LCL event.

MessageArgs.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the arguments for the message.

MessageId.description: The message Id of the LCL event.
MessageId.longDescription: This parameter shall contain message Id of the LCL event.

Severity.description: The severity of the LCL event.
Severity.longDescription: This parameter shall contain severity of the LCL event.

Tag.description: The tag for the LCL event.
Tag.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the tag for the LCL event.
